label: 四天王寺歴代別当主務次序
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
見出し読み: してんのうじ れきだい べっとう しゅむ じじょ
説明文: An appointment record of various offices within Shitennoji. It is not very extensive, but it offers some insight regarding the appointments to the important abbotship of Shitennoji.
